Projects.title: Smartstoo.site - Inventory Software
desc: Smartstoo.site is a web-based inventory management software designed for Tanzanian businesses. It allows users to track products, monitor stock levels, generate reports, and manage suppliers efficiently.
The software provides a clean dashboard for easy monitoring of inventory, alerts for low-stock items, and analytics to optimize business operations.

Projects.title: Ezymarket.site - E-commerce for Tanzania
desc: Ezymarket.site is an e-commerce platform focused on the Tanzanian market. It connects sellers with buyers, supports online payments, and provides a platform for local businesses to expand digitally.
The website includes product listings, cart management, secure checkout, and order tracking features.

Projects.title: Disihub.site - Startup Tech Hub
desc: Disihub.site is a technology-based startup hub focused on innovation, software development, and digital product design. The hub provides incubation, mentorship, and project support for tech startups in Tanzania.
It showcases ongoing projects, startup portfolios, and offers resources for aspiring entrepreneurs.

Projects.title: SmartstooPOS - Offline POS App
desc: SmartstooPOS is an offline-friendly point-of-sale application built for Tanzanian businesses. It allows users to process sales, track inventory, and generate receipts without requiring continuous internet access.
The app syncs data automatically when internet is available and ensures smooth daily operations for retail businesses.

Projects.title: Bitcoin Boy
desc: Bitcoin Boy is an educational and awareness project focused on cryptocurrency and Bitcoin in Tanzania. It provides resources, tutorials, and news for beginners to learn about Bitcoin and blockchain technology.
The platform features guides, trading tips, and beginner-friendly explanations of crypto concepts.

Projects.title: Bitcoin Education
desc: Bitcoin Education is a platform dedicated to teaching Tanzanians about cryptocurrency, blockchain, and digital finance. The platform provides courses, tutorials, and practical exercises on crypto trading and management.
It also focuses on safe practices, investment strategies, and understanding decentralized technologies.

Projects.title: Disihub Academy - Software Training
desc: Disihub Academy is an online platform providing software training and skill development for aspiring developers in Tanzania. Courses cover web development, mobile apps, UI/UX, and backend systems.
The platform also provides mentorship, project-based learning, and industry-aligned curriculum to prepare learners for real-world software development.
